column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////This might be the best restaurant in the city of Chicago.  The martinis and appetizers are out of this world.  The tab runs high
column2: but you get what you pay for at this spot.  I went here for a work outing and couldn't have been happier with the choice.  The beef stroganoff and cherry foie gras were the best i've had.
